Jew

If you use Google to search for “Judaism,” “Jewish” or “Jewish people,” the results are informative and relevant. So why is a search for “Jew” different? Slums

Some facts from Mike Davis’ article “Planet Of Slums“: In 1950 there were 86 cities in the world with a population over one million; today there are 400, and by 2015, there will be at least 550.
